activities: Our company provides an online promotions platform for our affiliates that include things like voting for favorite foods, taking quizzes, and playing sports 'pickem' games for football, baseball, nascar, and other sports. We collect email addresses, first and last name for contact information. In some cases affiliates may also collect on our systems, personal home addresses for prizes, and cell phone number for text alerts.
eucountries: France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
privacyprograms: We currently certify against open ports, and PCI certification to SAQ - A. We do not store any credit card information on our systems. If there is a credit card transaction, it is done by our third party  Trustwave's Trustkeeper scanning. This scan is done monthly to verify compliance against our outside facing servers and systems.
recoursemech: We are currently registered with JAMS http://www.jamsadr.com/Safe-Harbor-Confirmation/ for dispute and complaint resolution.
